Token.Abstract: The BITStoreUpdateManagerDelegate formal protocol defines methods for more interaction with BITStoreUpdateManager.
Informs which new version has been reported to be available

Parameter.Name: storeUpdateManager
Parameter.Abstract: The BITStoreUpdateManager instance invoking this delegate

Parameter.Name: newVersion
Parameter.Abstract: The new version string reported by the App Store

Parameter.Name: storeURL
Parameter.Abstract: The App Store URL for this app that could be invoked to let them perform the update.
